text: Minami-kuyakusho-mae is a Hiroden station (tram stop) on Hiroden Hijiyama Line, located in front of Hiroshima Minami Ward Office, in Hijiyama-honmachi, Minami-ku, Hiroshima. ==Routes== From Minami-kuyakusho-mae Station, there are one of Hiroden Streetcar routes. *25px Hiroshima Station - (via Hijiyama- shita) - Hiroshima Port Route ==Connections== ;█ Hijiyama Line :25px ::Hijiyama-bashi — Minami-kuyakusho-mae — Minami-machi 2-chome ==Around station== *Hiroshima Minami Ward Office *HIROSHIMA FM ==History== *Opened on March 1, 1982 ==See also== *Hiroden Streetcar Lines and Routes ==External links== Minami-kuyakusho-mae Station Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1982
title: Minami-kuyakusho-mae Station
